popupDone.title: Your checklist completed successfully!
popupDone.text: Browse more checklists and receive awards for this.

supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.subtitle: Do you want to complain?
supportPage.text1: We care about our users' comfort and strive to become even better. If you have any questions or are dissatisfied with the app content, please contact our <0>support team</0>. There you can ask a question or complain. Anyway, our team is happy to help, so you can always count on our support.
supportPage.text2: Got a problem? Our <0>support team</0> is ready to help!
supportPage.desc: What exactly do you think is unacceptable in this material?
supportPage.more: <0>Learn more</0> about the rules of Checklist

It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. section1.title: 1. Reaching goals
section1.subtitle: The Checklists – it's easy achievement your goals!
section1.text: We created the Checklists to make achieving your goals an easy process for you. The Checklists is a platform that uses responses from users who have already gone one way or another. This way, you will already have some sort of plan for achieving your goals, which makes the process much easier. Agree, when you're not a trailblazer, everything is smoother and easier.

section2.title: 2. Saving time
section2.subtitle: The Checklists – it's a time saver!
section2.text: Saving your precious time – is one of our most important missions. The Checklists make sure that you can do something useful and more important for you instead of scrolling through lots of sites with lots of questionable and unstructured information. With Checklists, you get structured and useful information without spending a lot of time searching!

section3.title: 3. More opportunities
section3.subtitle: The Checklists – it's a new opportunities!
section3.text: Thanks to the fact that users share their experiences, new opportunities open up for you. When you enter your request, you get a lot of variants for solving this or that problem. In this way you discover new locations, places, and methods of achieving your goals. And that means new opportunities!

creationOfChecklist.title: Creation of Checklist
creationOfChecklist.name: Name checklist
creationOfChecklist.text: Include all the information someone might need to make your checklist popular.
creationOfChecklist.desc: Add up to 3-5 tags to describe what your checlist is about
creationOfChecklist.popupTitle: Your checklist has been posted successfully!
creationOfChecklist.popupDesc: Create more checklists and get rewards for it.
creationOfChecklist.categoryDesc: Select a category from the list that applies to your checklist

mainPage.title: Ask question and get a checklist for your question
mainPage.heading: Share knowledge, create your own checklists and help people learn new things
mainPage.desc: Already more than 1000 people a day have their own checklists and correspond to pressing questions. Create your own checklists
mainPage.notFound: Sorry, no checklists found for this query

login.name: Name
login.desc: We have sent a password recoveinstructions to your email
login.done: A password reset link has been sent to your email. Make sure the email didn't end up in the Spam folder

login.emailTaken: Email address invalid or already taken
login.signInDesc: By signing up you agree to the <0>Terms of Service</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>

error.title: Oops..  Sorry, page not found
error.subtitle: That's an error. There was an error. Please try again later. That's all we know
error.button: Go back to the main page
